assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: DIP Corporation, a labor force solution company, provides personnel recruiting services in Japan. The company operates job information sites that offers job seekers with job information; and job information, advertising, and the recruitment of nursing staff. It operates in Personnel Recruiting Services Business and DX Business segments. The Personnel Recruiting Services Business segment offers Baitoru, a job portal site for part time job employees; Baitoru NEXT, a job information platform for those who are looking to work as regular or contract employees; Hatarako.net, a comprehensive job information site; and Baitoru PRO, a comprehensive job information site for specialized jobs. The DX Business segment supports the digital transformation (DX) of small and medium enterprises through the offering of KOBOT, a DX service packaged according to the workflows of client companies. DIP Corporation was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
